Hereditary paraganglioma-pheochromocytoma is typically diagnosed in a person's 30s.",GHR,hereditary paraganglioma-pheochromocytoma
How many people are affected by hereditary paraganglioma-pheochromocytoma ?,Hereditary paraganglioma-pheochromocytoma occurs in approximately 1 in 1 million people.,GHR,he
